description: A single subscription to a Query API
title: Subscription

id.description: Globally unique identifier for the subscription

ws_href.description: Address to connect to for the websocket subscription

max_update_rate_ms.description: Rate limiting for messages. Sets the minimum interval (in milliseconds) between consecutive WebSocket messages.

persist.description: Whether the API will retain or destroy the subscription after the final client disconnects

secure.description: Whether a secure WebSocket connection (wss://) is required.

resource_path.description: HTTP resource path in the Query API to which this subscription relates

params.description: Object containing attributes to filter the resource on as per the Query Parameters specification. Can be empty.
